issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Please have a look following PreCommit build on branch-2.7.

https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/15036/artifact/patchprocess/patch-asflicense-problems.txt
fields.summary: Fix ASF License warnings in branch-2.7

{noformat}+1	asflicense	0m 36s	The patch does not generate ASF License warnings.{noformat}

Nice to seee, no ASF warnings from branch-2.7... can somebody review and commit this..?

The fix looks good to me. Would you fix the indents in the following code?
{code}
       <configuration> // need a whitespace
          <excludes>
            <exclude>.gitattributes</exclude>
            <exclude>.gitignore</exclude>
            <exclude>.git/**</exclude>
            <exclude>.idea/**</exclude>
	    <exclude>**/build/**</exclude> // tab should be removed
        <exclude>**/patchprocess/**</exclude> // need 4 whitespaces
         </excludes> // need a whitespace
       </configuration> // need a whitespace
{code}
[~ajisakaa] thanks a lot for taking a look into this issue..Uploaded the patch..Kindly review..
